minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Thanks for the opportunity to present. Our model drift is now handling real-world insurance data.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: Consider the market timing How do you plan to scale this across different insurance verticals? What's your LTV?

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for POC.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about TAM, but our POC metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your accuracy is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the ML pipeline issues and expect churn to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: I've seen this before How do you plan to scale this across different insurance verticals? What's your TAM?

action_items.task: Prepare detailed CAC and LTV analysis for Investor Pitch & Feedback Sessions
Create multi-vertical scaling strategy document with TAM analysis
